description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Baddies have invaded my factory. Help me prove I'm the baddest villain in town by blasting them to kingdom come with my bombs! Play through all 30+ of my factory floors and rock your socks off to techno/punk music. And if that aint enough to satisfy your urge for destruction, enjoy the shock of rumble in your controller as you wreak havoc on all that oppose me! It's good to be bad.
description.short: Baddies have invaded my factory. Help me prove I'm the baddest villain in town by blasting them to kingdom come with my bombs! Play through all 30+ of my factory floors and rock your socks off to techno/punk music. And if that aint enough to satisfy your urge for destruction, enjoy the shock of rumble in your controller as you wreak havoc on all that oppose me! It's good to be bad.
